Cactus for Mac - A better workflow for hand coding websites

I currently don’t even own a Mac as I noodle around with working on ubuntu but if I did, and I wanted to create great looking websites easily, Cactus is worth a look:

Cactus for Mac - A better workflow for hand coding websites

There’s a range of exciting tools available to make building websites more enjoyable and efficient. But they can be challenging to set up. Cactus integrates these, so you can build better websites, faster.
